about_the_game:
Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace.
and inappropriate for viewing in the workplace.
Characters, storyline and action are fictitious.
Nudity or sexual content, general adult content

This game contains the following content

non-consensual sex
Extreme play
Sex with violence
Extreme SM play
BDSM

All characters must be 18 years of age or older.

★caution★
All text in this game has been translated by machine translation.

■story■
Yuta Ogino, who was looking for a part-time job during his summer vacation, is asked by his same age, Saya Kaminoe, who lives next door and is a bit curious about him, to help out at a festival in his hometown, so he heads to the remote, of Sakaza village.

In the village, Yuta is entertained by Kaya, Saya's older sister and a shrine maiden, and hears that he has nothing to do until the day of the festival, as he will be serving as a host for a festival called "Marebito", so Yuta decides to enjoy life in the countryside to the fullest.

As his expectations rise as he is surrounded by beautiful sisters and can live under the same roof, Kaya appears in his room and as he is invited, they start a relationship.
After that, Yuta, who is confused but has a relationship with Saya, is driven by an uncontrollable sexual desire every time he has a relationship.

At the end of the pleasure that accumulates over and over again, he eventually comes to know the strange fate of the shrine maiden sisters and the meaning of "Marebito" that has been imposed on him.

Japanese voice recording （※Male characters are not recorded)


◆Game Specifications◆
Novel game that can be read by clicking.
Heroine full voice
CG mode
Scene recollection


◆Content warning◆
The game contains nudity or sexual content, violence, sexual assault, drug use, or non-consensual sex,BDSM.
general adult content.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals over the age of 18.
This includes nudity, sex scenes,non-consensual sex,BDSM, overtly sexual images, and images with a sexual connotation.
Do not play this game if you are not yet 18 years of age or if you are visiting from a country or region where adult content is specifically prohibited by law.

name: SAKAZAMURANO INMATSURI KEGASARETA MIKOSHIMAI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista／7／8／8.1／10
  • Processor: Pentium4 1.3 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia, AMD or Intel Graphics with support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1.6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista／7／8／8.1／10
  • Processor: Pentium4 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia, AMD or Intel Graphics with support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1.6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

short_description: Erotic festival handed down in Sakaza Village
